SQL.LOAD: SELECT billing_header_id, dealer_id, date_file_sent, filename, total_billed_amt, status, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, reference_number, display_to_user FROM elp_billing_header WHERE billing_header_id = :billing_header_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT bh.billing_header_id, bh.dealer_id, d.dealer, d.dealer_name, d.company_id, bh.date_file_sent, bh.filename, bh.total_billed_amt, bh.status, bh.created_by, bh.created_date, bh.modified_by, bh.modified_date, bh.reference_number, bh.display_to_user FROM elp_billing_header bh, elp_dealer d WHERE bh.dealer_id = d.dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_COMPANY: SELECT bh.billing_header_id, bh.date_file_sent, bh.DATE_FILE_RECEIVED, bh.filename, bh.total_billed_amt, bh.status, bh.created_by, bh.created_date, bh.modified_by, bh.modified_date, bh.reference_number, 'BH' as source FROM elp_billing_header bh, elp_dealer d WHERE bh.dealer_id = d.dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause UNION ALL SELECT bhr.billing_header_rej_id as billing_header_id, bhr.date_file_sent, bhr.DATE_FILE_RECEIVED, bhr.filename, bhr.total_billed_amt, bhr.status, bhr.created_by, bhr.created_date, bhr.modified_by, bhr.modified_date, bhr.reference_number, 'BHR' as source FROM elp_billing_header_rejects bhr, elp_company c WHERE bhr.company_id = c.company_id --dynamic_A_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_billing_header SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, date_file_sent = :date_file_sent, filename = :filename, total_billed_amt = :total_billed_amt, status = :status, modified_by = :modified_by, reference_number = :reference_number, display_to_user =:display_to_user WHERE billing_header_id = :billing_header_id
